questions:
1. What technology roles is PayPal hiring for that align with their digital transformation goals? (Tables: CompanyHiringDetail, IndustryITTrend)

2. How does Srikanth Nadhamuni's work influence technology decisions at Aadhaar or HDFC Bank? (Tables: PersonaTwitterProfile, IndustryITTrend)

3. Can you draft a pitch email to PayPal's CTO highlighting AI in digital payments? (Tables: PersonaYoutubeProfile, CompanyHiringDetail)

4. What current IT trends could impact hiring strategies at Wells Enterprises? (Tables: CompanyHiringDetail, IndustryITTrend)

5. What insights from Sri Shivananda’s talks can guide fintech investment focuses? (Tables: PersonaYoutubeProfile, IndustryITTrend)

6. How are companies in the oil and gas sector integrating AI to support their business applications? (Tables: IndustryITTrend, CompanyHiringDetail)

7. Can we identify key tech roles that might help improve customer data security for companies? (Tables: CompanyHiringDetail, IndustryITTrend)

8. What are the latest technology adoption trends that could shape the communication strategies for nonprofits? (Tables: IndustryITTrend, PersonaTwitterProfile)

PersonaTwitterProfile.name: Ganesh Natarajan
PersonaTwitterProfile.description: Non Nascor Mihi Solum - Live not for Self alone ! I am a digital and social evangelist, mentor and invest in entrepreneurs and also serve on large Boards.

CompanyHiringDetail.Detail:
- Responsible for supporting hardware and software on IT computer related devices for Wells Enterprises employees
- Under general supervision, perform analysis and assists in a variety of service desk activities
- Equipment supported includes, but is not limited to, PCs, tablets, mobile phones, plant vehicle and handheld equipment, and printers
- Associates degree with an emphasis in computers or equivalent experience. Certification by recognized industry leading firms is advised
- 4 or more years of computer repair, hardware and software troubleshooting experience

- Exhibit advanced technical skills/abilities required for developing, implementing, and maintaining business software applications. Liaise between the stakeholders, vendors, project management and the technical team on solution architecture options, impacts and decisions
- Utilize independent judgment to efficiently create technical solutions by applying skills and knowledge as well as interpreting business requirements and strategy
- Provide on-going information, support, mentoring and training as needed for internal customers, team members and IT Dept
- Architect and deliver high quality solutions that ensure accuracy, standards compliance, fully meet key requirements, and have acceptable response times while adhering to time constraints and project deadlines

- Efficiently create technical solutions by applying skills and knowledge as well as interpreting business requirements and direction
- Test/debug application systems to ensure accuracy, standards compliance, meet requirements, and have acceptable response times while adhering to time constraints and project deadlines
- Document application systems and procedures according to organizational needs. This includes test scripts, LDRP, maintenance, process, training, customer, etc., ensuring compliance with department standards

- Efficiently create technical solutions by applying skills and knowledge as well as interpreting business requirements and direction
- Test/debug application systems to ensure accuracy, standards compliance, meet requirements, and have acceptable response times while adhering to time constraints and project deadlines
- Document application systems and procedures according to organizational needs. This includes test scripts, LDRP, maintenance, process, training, customer, etc., ensuring compliance with department standards
- Lead efforts of moderate to complex projects, often giving direction to other team members and internal customers. Create technical solutions by interpreting requirements and strategy

- Primary IT liason for facility; works closely with plant leadership to coordinate IT activity, systems changes / outages, training, trouble-shooting, new projects
- Proactively maintain and document the physical network/telco/AV/Industrial Controls environments. Provides recommendations for network improvements and enhancements. Supports the corporate network engineers as necessary with troubleshooting, problem resolution according to established standards
- Assists in the planning, advises, recommends use of new technology or technology enhancements.
- Performs upgrades to hardware and software. Deploy / maintain new hardware and software in compliance with internal controls, policies and standards

- Responsible to develop, implement, maintain, and support company-wide business applications while focusing on sales & distribution, logistic execution, and production planning
- Supports the rollout teams in the Americas region during implantation

- Responsible for leading the Application Support Center in America to ensure the business-critical IT Applications are supported
- Ensure that business requirements are translated and implemented together with the 3rd Level Support
- Oversees Service administration and service budget compliance

- Responsible for engaging in research, development, and integration of commercial electronic locksets in an IoT based environment
- Create high-level architectures for new products, assigning specific technical requirements to SW, FW, Mechanical and Electrical Design aspects
- Manage and monitor deployed systems and infrastructure, besides performing full product life cycle development tasks

- Responsible to focus on business-critical IT projects around economics and a strong focus towards SAP core components as well as other business-related Software implementations combined
- Perform project management of defined business application projects
- Ensure costs, resources, and time Management within projects

- Work within a development team, enhancing the digital marketing capabilities of the Safe Auto websites
- Develop clean, standards based modern code
- Work with team members to ensue tasks are completed on schedule, conduct code reviews, maintain code quality and troubleshoot defects
- Enforce coding standards that support the organization’s architectural roadmap/strategy
- Experience with the following technologies: C#; .Net framework (4.5 and above), AngularJS or Angular 4 and above, SQL Server or Oracle (DB2 experience preferred), Azure DevOps, VSTS, Xamarin, Entity Framework, Web API/Rest API

IndustryITTrend.Detail: IT Software and Services players are focusing on artificial intelligence, IoT, Networks, Wireless Systems and Cybersecurity​
Oil and Gas industry players are focusing more on advanced technology such as artificial intelligence, big data & analytics, robotics and Internet of Things
Nonprofit organizations need to be at the forefront of technology and workforce trends as there exist substantial opportunities for organizations to adopt technology to support their mission forward
As digital transformation continues to gain momentum, the integration of AI, big data analytics and cybersecurity will play pivotal roles in defining the future of business services.
Customers have embraced the idea of on-demand media trends with a focus on data privacy & security, content personalization, AR/VR, Blockchain & ERP
Companies in the legal industry are focusing more on remote depositions, automation, transcription technology, electronic billing and data security
Consumer goods industry players are focusing on leveraging digitalization, analytics, blockchain, chatbots and augmented reality
The future of fintech industry looks bright, with Robotic Process Automation, Blockchain, Digital Banking, IoT, and Voice-based payments
Banking and financial services players are focusing on Internet of Things, Artificial Intelligence, DigitalTransformation and Blockchain

AI, Blockchain, AR, VR, and live streaming are transforming the media and entertainment industry by enhancing content personalization, security, immersive experiences, and real-time audience engagement.
